official-title.#text:
To prioritize certain Government obligations for
		  continued payment in the event that the statutory debt limit is reached, to
		  appropriate funds for the pay and allowances of all members of the Armed
		  Forces, and for those civilian employees of the Department of Defense and the
		  Coast Guard serving in a combat zone, and for other purposes.
